name: New Beginnings (m0ej0e)
description:
My first game. It was a laborious process that I loved. I did receive a little help from my brother for the asteroid field generation using bitmaps.

Enjoy the semi functional Main Menu and then the basic space movement and combat with limited  enemy AI. Try to kill at least 14 enemies to win this version of the game. There are no working upgrades ATM but will be added and updated soon.

This game is just the basic mechanics of a larger game I now want to make this into.

There is a lot to fix, add and tweak but I am proud of what I accomplished.

Needs to be run at 1920X1080 for the Hud to be scaled correctly. 

I welcome any input!
